LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: I was led to the wheelhouse by a briskly-walking Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x302
STRING: How could she walk so smoothly in such a long kimono?

LABEL: 0x356
STRING: I wasn't sure if that was a skill that all girls had mastered or if it was unique to Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x3C7
STRING: 「Yukari-saan!」

LABEL: 0x44D
STRING: 「Looks like it's unlocked.」

LABEL: 0x47C
STRING: 「...Hey, we're coming in.」

LABEL: 0x4A0
STRING: I repeatedly knocked on the door and called out to her, but there was no answer.

LABEL: 0x5A0
STRING: Tokiwa and I entered the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x5CE
STRING: The room was lined with several displays, gauges, and control panels.

LABEL: 0x60E
STRING: I could see why Yukari tried so hard to avoid outsiders entering.

LABEL: 0x650
STRING: ...This was the brains of the <SHEEP III>, as it were.

LABEL: 0x6F1
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x712
STRING: Tokiwa called out to me in a whisper.

LABEL: 0x73E
STRING: Wondering what it was about, I looked over and saw her beckoning to me repeatedly.

LABEL: 0x79E
STRING: 「What is it――」

LABEL: 0x7C4
STRING: And then, I looked in the direction her fingertip indicated and understood everything.

LABEL: 0x806
STRING: The display in front of the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x82E
STRING: A shadow was slumped down right in front of it.

LABEL: 0x888
STRING: Yukari was there, breathing peacefully while fast asleep.

LABEL: 0x8D0
STRING: As the chief attendant and one of the only surviving crew members,

LABEL: 0x91C
STRING: she must have been steeling herself constantly in this abnormal situation.

LABEL: 0x94C
STRING: Seeing her fall asleep like this made me feel a bit guilty.

LABEL: 0x9A0
STRING: However, the sight of her sleeping peacefully using her own arm as a pillow made her look like a little girl.

LABEL: 0xA00
STRING: ...I got an urge to pat her on the head.

LABEL: 0xA36
STRING: She'd definitely get mad if I did that, though.

LABEL: 0xAC2
STRING: 「As far as I can tell...」

LABEL: 0xAE8
STRING: 「She's totally asleep.」

LABEL: 0xB0F
STRING: 「Looks like it...」

LABEL: 0xB99
STRING: 「This is an unparalleled chance.」

LABEL: 0xBCC
STRING: A chance?

LABEL: 0xBE8
STRING: What was this girl talking about?

LABEL: 0xC12
STRING: 「No, no, no.」

LABEL: 0xC34
STRING: 「Just because they're asleep doesn't mean you can lay a finger on someone.」

LABEL: 0xC7A
STRING: 「The moment she wakes up, you'll be crushed by her ancient kung-fu techniques.」

LABEL: 0xCC2
STRING: 「Even if we succeed in subduing Yukari-san, there's still Hiragino-san to worry about.」

LABEL: 0xD18
STRING: 「Taking a risk like that over a body like hers is unacceptable.」

LABEL: 0xDDE
STRING: 「Huh.」

LABEL: 0xDF9
STRING: Tokiwa nodded vaguely as if she had no idea what I was going on about.

LABEL: 0xE44
STRING: 「Well, whatever.」

LABEL: 0xECB
STRING: 「I was thinking of using that while she's asleep.」

LABEL: 0xF2A
STRING: 「That?」

LABEL: 0xF51
STRING: 「The slurp gun.」

LABEL: 0xF92
STRING: The slurp gun... It was a suction-type deep-sea creature collector.

LABEL: 0xFC6
STRING: Indeed, with a slurp gun, it may be possible to catch those creatures without going underwater.

LABEL: 0x102A
STRING: Tokiwa began staggering toward the control panel.

LABEL: 0x10CE
STRING: 「Now, we can use it without Yukari-san getting mad at us.」

LABEL: 0x1113
STRING: 「Wait a minute. We're supposed to get a permission first, right?」

LABEL: 0x115C
STRING: 「Really? ...Oops, my hand slipped!」

LABEL: 0x119D
STRING: 「What are you doing?!」

LABEL: 0x11D7
STRING: In the blink of an eye, Tokiwa had planted herself in the pilot's seat in front of the control panel.

LABEL: 0x1255
STRING: With a hum, she fiddled with the equipment in front of her with both hands.

LABEL: 0x12A3
STRING: 「H-Hey!」

LABEL: 0x12BF
STRING: This was bad.

LABEL: 0x12D5
STRING: The <SHEEP III> was done for.

LABEL: 0x12FA
STRING: Several windows opened and closed on the display in front of the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x1348
STRING: She processed so many messages at such a speed that I wasn't even sure if she recognized all of them.

LABEL: 0x13A4
STRING: All I could do was stare at the dizzyingly changing colors on the screen.

LABEL: 0x13EC
STRING: ――Then, a dozen seconds later...

LABEL: 0x147C
STRING: 「There.」

LABEL: 0x1497
STRING: Her humming stopped at the same time as the screen turned black.

LABEL: 0x14D9
STRING: ...It was broken...

LABEL: 0x14F5
STRING: ...Did she break it?

LABEL: 0x1519
STRING: There was no response from the screen at all.

LABEL: 0x1543
STRING: How could this be?

LABEL: 0x1563
STRING: Tokiwa...

LABEL: 0x157B
STRING: 「Wh-What have you――」

LABEL: 0x15B6
STRING: 「I'm done.」

LABEL: 0x15D7
STRING: With that, she hit the return key.

LABEL: 0x1605
STRING: Instantly.

LABEL: 0x16A0
STRING: The display lit up, illuminating the sea.

LABEL: 0x16D8
STRING: Was this... an image from the camera of the capture unit?

LABEL: 0x1712
STRING: How?

LABEL: 0x1728
STRING: So, in other words, this was what Tokiwa was doing...?

LABEL: 0x1762
STRING: 「How did you...?」

LABEL: 0x17EC
STRING: 「It moved because I operated it.」

LABEL: 0x1825
STRING: 「I mean, how do you know how to control the capture unit?!」

LABEL: 0x187C
STRING: 「I learned it from my father in Hawaii.」

LABEL: 0x18A8
STRING: 「As a beautiful girl genius, nothing is impossible for me.」

LABEL: 0x18F7
STRING: 「Aren't you full of yourself...」

LABEL: 0x1983
STRING: 「Heh heh heh!」

LABEL: 0x19A2
STRING: Tokiwa puffed out her chest at my confused expression.

LABEL: 0x19EE
STRING: Well, as long as she could pilot it, I had no complaints.

LABEL: 0x1A2A
STRING: Guess I'll leave it to her for now.

LABEL: 0x1ABC
STRING: ――And, just then.

LABEL: 0x1ADA
STRING: A golden shadow suddenly crossed the display.

LABEL: 0x1B6B
STRING: 「...What the hell was that?」

LABEL: 0x1B91
STRING: Tokiwa moved her stick, and the camera caught the shadow again.

LABEL: 0x1BD3
STRING: No, it couldn't catch it.

LABEL: 0x1BF5
STRING: It was so huge that it couldn't fit on the display.

LABEL: 0x1C33
STRING: In a sea full of tiny fish and mollusks...

LABEL: 0x1C63
STRING: ...A giant aberration had made its appearance.

LABEL: 0x1C83
STRING: Its huge body was bizarre on its own, but it wasn't merely big.

LABEL: 0x1CC5
STRING: It had smooth skin that reflected light.

LABEL: 0x1CF5
STRING: A vivid luster.

LABEL: 0x1D11
STRING: There were tentacles surrounding its giant main body.

LABEL: 0x1D39
STRING: It was swaying and wriggling in the waves.

LABEL: 0x1D63
STRING: An evil appearance reminiscent of a sunken old ruler.

LABEL: 0x1D95
STRING: What the hell was that...?

LABEL: 0x1E0E
STRING: ――No.

LABEL: 0x1E26
STRING: I knew what it was.

LABEL: 0x1E42
STRING: I was seeing it with my own eyes...

LABEL: 0x1E64
STRING: ...But, my brain didn't understand.

LABEL: 0x1E8A
STRING: I didn't want to understand.

LABEL: 0x1EA8
STRING: That was...

LABEL: 0x1EBE
STRING: No way.

LABEL: 0x1ED4
STRING: It was far more massive than any I'd ever seen before.

LABEL: 0x1F0E
STRING: A giant

LABEL: 0x1F24
STRING: squid.

LABEL: 0x1F38
STRING: I repeat.

LABEL: 0x1F54
STRING: A squid.

LABEL: 0x1FDF
STRING: It was huge!

LABEL: 0x2029
STRING: Tokiwa let out an unusual voice.

LABEL: 0x2041
STRING: I reflexively looked back at her in the pilot's seat.

LABEL: 0x21F4
STRING: She was trembling.

LABEL: 0x220E
STRING: Tokiwa opened her eyes wide,

LABEL: 0x2236
STRING: and stared at the display without blinking.

LABEL: 0x2276
STRING: Her passionate gaze was fixed on the huge squid's abnormally big eyes.

LABEL: 0x22B8
STRING: A chance encounter...

LABEL: 0x22D0
STRING: Before long, drops of water fell from the corners of Tokiwa's eyes.

LABEL: 0x23B8
STRING: 「...Finally...」

LABEL: 0x2465
STRING: 「Finally, we meet...!」

LABEL: 0x24B0
STRING: It was a touching encounter...

LABEL: 0x24CE
STRING: No, no, no, no.

LABEL: 0x24EE
STRING: That was squid.

LABEL: 0x2508
STRING: I was almost fooled by her performance, but...

LABEL: 0x2530
STRING: That was a squid.

LABEL: 0x2564
STRING: 「Ah, geez...」

LABEL: 0x2582
STRING: What's with her getting excited all by herself...?

LABEL: 0x25B4
STRING: Yukari lay facedown in front of the screen where the giant squid was being displayed.

LABEL: 0x25FE
STRING: What was with this scene?

LABEL: 0x2628
STRING: Tokiwa eventually waved her hand at the screen.

LABEL: 0x266F
STRING: 「Bye bye, Iskandar-chan...」

LABEL: 0x26A6
STRING: They met and parted in the blink of an eye.

LABEL: 0x26D0
STRING: Tokiwa looked rather satisfied after her farewell.

LABEL: 0x26FC
STRING: Seemed nice, not having to think about anything.

LABEL: 0x2A18
STRING: For a while after that, it was all Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x2A4C
STRING: She had no hesitation in calling herself a genius beauty,

LABEL: 0x2A80
STRING: and her piloting of the exploration unit, which was clumsy at first,

LABEL: 0x2AD6
STRING: had quickly evolved to the point where she could be called a huntress of the sea.

LABEL: 0x2B7A
STRING: 「Bshhht.」

LABEL: 0x2BB7
STRING: Accompanied by an emotionless call, she sucked in her target with the slurp gun.

LABEL: 0x2BFF
STRING: 「Hey, isn't that enough already?」

LABEL: 0x2C40
STRING: 「Indeed, I do feel like I've had my fill of fun.」

LABEL: 0x2C76
STRING: 「Besides, I'm getting a little sleepy――」

LABEL: 0x2CBF
STRING: Just as she said that...

LABEL: 0x2CE5
STRING: A huge shadow crossed the screen once more.

LABEL: 0x2D0F
STRING: Was it the giant squid again?

LABEL: 0x2D33
STRING: Whatever it was, its skin had the same kind of luster as before.

LABEL: 0x2D65
STRING: However, there was something different about its color.

LABEL: 0x2D9F
STRING: Then, its rather un-squid-like, beat-up epidermis turned towards us.

LABEL: 0x2DEB
STRING: 「...Is that a squid?」

LABEL: 0x2E83
STRING: 「No... It's not a giant squid.」

LABEL: 0x2EB9
STRING: 「I don't have a creature... like that in my encyclopedia.」

LABEL: 0x2EF2
STRING: You don't have to sound like Napoleon...

LABEL: 0x2F4C
STRING: But now that I thought about it, what kind of a creature did Tokiwa, an erudite marine otaku, not know about?

LABEL: 0x2FA6
STRING: It was definitely a big deal, whatever it was.

LABEL: 0x2FDE
STRING: Tokiwa operated the slurp gun and put the creature's huge body on the display――

LABEL: 0x303D
STRING: 「Bsssht―Ah... No good.」

LABEL: 0x306E
STRING: She tried to catch it, unsuccessfully.

LABEL: 0x3094
STRING: No wonder.

LABEL: 0x30AE
STRING: I mean, if she sucked in a huge creature like that, it would be the end of the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x30FB
STRING: We were already in a pretty bad situation, but I guess that would be like jumping straight to the bad end.

LABEL: 0x3214
STRING: 「Ah!」

LABEL: 0x3236
STRING: 「What now?」

LABEL: 0x3263
STRING: 「A pandea rubra!」

LABEL: 0x3290
STRING: What the hell was that?

LABEL: 0x32AA
STRING: The name she proclaimed so cheerfully didn't sound familiar to me, but...

LABEL: 0x331C
STRING: 「I see... This is the "red lantern" jellyfish, huh?」

LABEL: 0x3354
STRING: It looked just as its name implied.

LABEL: 0x3388
STRING: Like a red lantern floating inside a jellyfish.

LABEL: 0x33D2
STRING: Indeed, if I was asked to name it, I could only name it the red lantern jellyfish.

LABEL: 0x3487
STRING: However, Tokiwa was now frozen in place after looking at it.

LABEL: 0x34C3
STRING: 「...Wh-What's wrong?」

LABEL: 0x34FE
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, you don't seem to understand the importance of this situation.」

LABEL: 0x3544
STRING: 「Ever since it was first discovered in 1913, the red lantern jellyfish has almost never been sighted.」

LABEL: 0x359A
STRING: 「Subsequent research revealed around 2008 that there are many of them in the seas around Japan...」

LABEL: 0x35F4
STRING: 「However, in recent years, the number of observations has been declining again.」

LABEL: 0x3637
STRING: 「Ah, I see.」

LABEL: 0x3651
STRING: She was talking too fast.

LABEL: 0x366D
STRING: And, she wasn't looking at me at all.

LABEL: 0x369B
STRING: Tokiwa just kept mumbling to herself, like she was on some sort of a trip.

LABEL: 0x3753
STRING: 「It's a rare species...」

LABEL: 0x3773
STRING: 「A rare species...」

LABEL: 0x384B
STRING: 「As I thought, we have to protect it!」

LABEL: 0x3883
STRING: Tokiwa prepared the slurp gun.

LABEL: 0x38AD
STRING: There was no hesitation in her eyes.

LABEL: 0x38CF
STRING: Hey, what did she mean by "protect?"

LABEL: 0x38ED
STRING: 「Even if you say it's rare...」

LABEL: 0x3919
STRING: 「All living beings are equally significant in their existence.」

LABEL: 0x3953
STRING: 「There's nothing heavy or light about them.」

LABEL: 0x397D
STRING: 「It's fine to say some are rare and protect them, but it's like you're attaching a weight on their life...」

LABEL: 0x3A43
STRING: 「Why should some species be prioritized for protection?」

LABEL: 0x3A8F
STRING: 「You don't seem to understand the basics of that, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x3AD5
STRING: 「I didn't just say it out of curiosity, you know?」

LABEL: 0x3B28
STRING: 「A-Ah, sorry.」

LABEL: 0x3B5B
STRING: 「Have you ever studied the theory of evolution?」

LABEL: 0x3B96
STRING: Tokiwa turned toward me readily.

LABEL: 0x3BC8
STRING: ...Crap, did I step on a landmine here?

LABEL: 0x3C0A
STRING: The first thing that came to mind when I heard the word "evolution" was the story of the Heike crab.

LABEL: 0x3CBE
STRING: 「The definition of "evolution."」

LABEL: 0x3CDE
STRING: 「Namely――」

LABEL: 0x3D00
STRING: 「Mutations between individuals.」

LABEL: 0x3D2A
STRING: 「And, the inheritance of said mutations.」

LABEL: 0x3D52
STRING: 「These mutations give an advantage in survival and reproduction.」

LABEL: 0x3D90
STRING: 「The change in traits that follows this sequence of events is called evolution.」

LABEL: 0x3DD1
STRING: Tokiwa looked up as if she was reading from a textbook.

LABEL: 0x3E93
STRING: 「――But, strictly speaking...」

LABEL: 0x3EBD
STRING: 「That last condition should be "survival and reproduction are not handicapped."」

LABEL: 0x3F14
STRING: 「What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x3FA2
STRING: 「Do you need an explanation about heredity?」

LABEL: 0x3FD0
STRING: 「If you don't know about it, I can give you a quick 90 minute lecture.」

LIST.STRING: No need for an explanation. I know a lot about it.
I don't really get it, so please explain.

LABEL: 0x40E8
STRING: 「It's a rather simple concept.」

LABEL: 0x4116
STRING: 「I'm not just talking about Darwinian evolution. We need to think about neutral evolution as well, don't you think?」

LABEL: 0x417A
STRING: 「And in the context of neutral evolution, there's something called the bottleneck effect.」

LABEL: 0x41CD
STRING: 「I see.」

LABEL: 0x41E7
STRING: Tokiwa spoke in a manner that seemed to mimic Yukari's lectures.

LABEL: 0x4225
STRING: Whether it was an imitation or not, I couldn't tell.

LABEL: 0x4285
STRING: For some reason, she was treated dismissively on the <SHEEP III>,

LABEL: 0x42C8
STRING: but in reality, she was one of the most intelligent girls in the world.

LABEL: 0x4308
STRING: She might be the most appropriate person to be called a "teacher" here.

LABEL: 0x4358
STRING: She might have even given lectures back on the surface.

LABEL: 0x43A2
STRING: Her straightforward and easy-to-understand explanation seemed to be a glimpse of this.

LABEL: 0x447D
STRING: 「Understood. Then, please prepare your pen and notebook.」

LABEL: 0x451A
STRING: 「Ahem.」

LABEL: 0x453C
STRING: After clumsily clearing her throat, Tokiwa sharply raised a finger.

LABEL: 0x45E6
STRING: 「Currently, most creatures are divided into males and females.」

LABEL: 0x4620
STRING: 「During reproduction, it's these opposite sex's role to produce offspring.」

LABEL: 0x465E
STRING: 「Their offspring inherit a set of genomes from their parents.」

LABEL: 0x46A5
STRING: 「There are two genes they inherit that fit into a specific genetic locus.」

LABEL: 0x46EB
STRING: 「Genetic locus?」

LABEL: 0x4707
STRING: Tokiwa nodded slightly as I repeated the unfamiliar phrase.

LABEL: 0x475A
STRING: 「A genetic locus is the position of a gene in a genome or chromosome.」

LABEL: 0x47A4
STRING: 「There's a place in the genome that determines the color of your hair, for example.」

LABEL: 0x47F8
STRING: 「If you inherit a "golden hair" gene from your father and a "chestnut hair" gene from your mother,

LABEL: 0x4856
STRING: that pair of genes would fit into the "hair color" genetic locus.」

LABEL: 0x489F
STRING: 「The "choices" of multiple genes that fit into a single locus are called alleles.」

LABEL: 0x4903
STRING: 「So, in this case, "blonde" and "chestnut hair" are the alleles.」

LABEL: 0x4958
STRING: Two genes, two coexisting possibilities――

LABEL: 0x49F6
STRING: 「Of course, if you inherit the same set of alleles in a certain genetic locus, it will manifest itself.」

LABEL: 0x4A5A
STRING: 「This is called homozygosity.」

LABEL: 0x4A8C
STRING: 「It's simple. If you inherit "blonde" and "blonde" from your parents, of course the child will be "blonde" too.」

LABEL: 0x4AE4
STRING: 「But, what would happen if that wasn't the case?」

LABEL: 0x4B1E
STRING: 「For example, what if they inherit two different alleles? What if they were "blonde" and "chestnut" hair?」

LABEL: 0x4B73
STRING: Tokiwa paused to give her audience time to think.

LABEL: 0x4BB1
STRING: A child who inherited blonde and chestnut hair...

LABEL: 0x4BDD
STRING: If I had to guess, I'd say they would have a color somewhere between the two――

LABEL: 0x4C8F
STRING: 「――That doesn't mean that the child will have mixed-color hair.」

LABEL: 0x4CCB
STRING: 「There are strong and weak alleles.」

LABEL: 0x4D05
STRING: 「For example, in this case, "chestnut" is the dominant allele.」

LABEL: 0x4DA0
STRING: 「Therefore, the child will be born with chestnut hair.」

LABEL: 0x4DE5
STRING: 「Wait a minute. What does the strength of a gene――」

LABEL: 0x4E28
STRING: 「In the case of genes, the strength of a gene is referred to as "dominant" or "recessive."」

LABEL: 0x4E71
STRING: 「Then, won't we end up with only "dominant" ones with each successive generation?」

LABEL: 0x4ED1
STRING: 「Sooner or later, "blondes" will become extinct...」

LABEL: 0x4F07
STRING: I was familiar with stories that the blonde population was declining, in fact.

LABEL: 0x4F59
STRING: While we talked about diversity, it was reasonable to think that if we let nature take its course, we would eventually approach a steady state.

LABEL: 0x5015
STRING: 「To put it simply, yes. But the truth is, that's not always the case.」

LABEL: 0x5069
STRING: 「For example, even if both parents have chestnut hair, sometimes their child will have blonde hair.」

LABEL: 0x50B9
STRING: 「Do you know why?」

LABEL: 0x50E6
STRING: 「...Brood parasitism?」

LABEL: 0x5111
STRING: 「Remember, organisms have a "pair" of alleles for a single locus.」

LABEL: 0x516D
STRING: 「So, if both parents are a set of "blonde and chestnut" and the child happens to inherit "blonde" from each of them,

LABEL: 0x51A5
STRING: the child can be born with blonde hair.」

LABEL: 0x5202
STRING: 「Uh-huh.」

LABEL: 0x521C
STRING: From what I'd heard so far, it was probably the same thing for your blood type.

LABEL: 0x525A
STRING: Children of all blood types can be born to parents of type AO and BO.

LABEL: 0x52A8
STRING: Even if they hadn't actually manifested, they still had the genes.

LABEL: 0x5352
STRING: 「But, Katagiri-san makes a very good point, don't you think?」

LABEL: 0x5396
STRING: 「All of the genes that exist in a certain species' population――」

LABEL: 0x53D6
STRING: 「From the genes that determine traits such as hair color, as I mentioned earlier...」

LABEL: 0x542A
STRING: 「...To the genes that determine the color of the eyes, the shape of the ears... The collection of all these genes is called the "gene pool."」

LABEL: 0x5490
STRING: 「The ratio of alleles in this gene pool is constantly changing.」

LABEL: 0x54E9
STRING: Constantly changing gene pool.

LABEL: 0x5581
STRING: 「I'll use the Heike crab from yesterday as an example.」

LABEL: 0x55AF
STRING: 「Originally, there must have been crabs with patterns that were not "faces" in their population.」

LABEL: 0x5607
STRING: 「In other words, alleles expressing those "non-facial patterns" were present in the Heike crab gene pool.」

LABEL: 0x5679
STRING: 「But at some point, those alleles were reduced by human hands.」

LABEL: 0x56D1
STRING: 「And in the end, only the allele that manifested those facial patterns remained.」

LABEL: 0x5720
STRING: That was how the Heike crab came to obtain its human-face pattern.

LABEL: 0x5754
STRING: It was a change in the ratio of genetic information.

LABEL: 0x5778
STRING: 「Isn't that what you'd call evolution?」

LABEL: 0x57B9
STRING: 「Exactly.」

LABEL: 0x57D3
STRING: 「In other words, evolution can also be described as "changes in the frequency of alleles in a gene pool."」

LABEL: 0x589D
STRING: After explaining that much, Tokiwa stared into my eyes with a surprised expression.

LABEL: 0x58EB
STRING: I instinctively took a step back from her approaching gaze.

LABEL: 0x5915
STRING: 「Wh-What?」

LABEL: 0x5942
STRING: 「What were we talking about again?」

LABEL: 0x596F
STRING: Th-This girl, I swear...

LABEL: 0x598D
STRING: Seemingly absorbed in her explanation, I patted Tokiwa on the head to cool her down.

LABEL: 0x5A57
STRING: 「What's this hand about?」

LABEL: 0x5A84
STRING: 「We were talking about why red lantern jellyfish are so important.」

LABEL: 0x5B34
STRING: 「Ah, that's right.」

LABEL: 0x5B5B
STRING: Tokiwa clapped her hands in front of her chest.

LABEL: 0x5BF7
STRING: 「In fact, what we've called "evolution" until now has been an extension of the natural selection

LABEL: 0x5C31
STRING: proposed by Darwin in "The Origin of Species."」

LABEL: 0x5C7F
STRING: 「In other words, that only alleles that are favorable for survival and reproduction will remain.」

LABEL: 0x5CD2
STRING: I didn't think we would spend this much time talking about something so simple.

LABEL: 0x5D12
STRING: Was she actually going to give a full 90 minute lecture?

LABEL: 0x5DB8
STRING: 「But, think about it.」

LABEL: 0x5DE2
STRING: 「Genes are constantly mutating, and mutations at the DNA level are not uncommon.」

LABEL: 0x5E43
STRING: 「Do you believe that all such mutations are advantageous or disadvantageous to survival?」

LABEL: 0x5EAC
STRING: 「I don't think so... Am I wrong?」

LABEL: 0x5EDF
STRING: 「Most genetic mutations "have no effect" on the surface.」

LABEL: 0x5F27
STRING: 「In other words, there are many mutations that are neither advantageous nor disadvantageous to survival and reproduction.」

LABEL: 0x5FB1
STRING: 「The thing is...」

LABEL: 0x5FD1
STRING: 「Even alleles that seem meaningless at first glance can change in frequency within a gene pool.」

LABEL: 0x6037
STRING: 「And then, eventually, one of them will become fixed.」

LABEL: 0x608A
STRING: 「H-Hey, wait a minute.」

LABEL: 0x6124
STRING: 「Yes, Katagiri-kun?」

LABEL: 0x6149
STRING: Katagiri-kun...

LABEL: 0x6167
STRING: I felt stupid for raising my hand, but she exuded such a professor-like aura...

LABEL: 0x61A9
STRING: 「Things are getting a little confusing, so let's take a moment to clear things up.」

LABEL: 0x61F3
STRING: 「Uh, so individuals with alleles that are detrimental to survival and reproduction will not survive.」

LABEL: 0x6245
STRING: 「That's why there are less and less of them in the group.」

LABEL: 0x627F
STRING: 「That way, only the alleles that are favorable for survival will increase in the gene pool and eventually become fixed.」

LABEL: 0x62EB
STRING: 「That's what the first story was about, right?」

LABEL: 0x637F
STRING: 「Wonderfully explained. You've earned a gold star.」

LABEL: 0x63BD
STRING: 「But, that's not the case with the second story.」

LABEL: 0x63EF
STRING: 「If it's neither advantageous nor disadvantageous, why would the numbers increase or decrease?」

LABEL: 0x6435
STRING: 「Is there some kind of intent at work there, too?」

LABEL: 0x646B
STRING: Tokiwa smiled happily when I asked her a question.

LABEL: 0x64A3
STRING: She looked like... an instructor at a seminar.

LABEL: 0x64D7
STRING: I wondered how Kawanabe-sensei was doing...

LABEL: 0x650A
STRING: 「There's some meaning behind that... Or rather, there's a reason.」

LABEL: 0x6554
STRING: 「Even if you're talking about a population of a species, there's a finite number of individuals.」

LABEL: 0x6594
STRING: 「It's natural for numerical biases to occur over time.」

LABEL: 0x65E0
STRING: 「The element of chance, so to speak, causes allele frequencies to change...」

LABEL: 0x6687
STRING: 「――That's what's called "genetic drift."」

LABEL: 0x66BB
STRING: 「And when this "chance" causes an allele neutral to survival to be fixed in place,

LABEL: 0x6709
STRING: that's what we call "neutral evolution."」

LABEL: 0x6765
STRING: 「That is another evolutionary mechanism, different from natural selection.」

LABEL: 0x67B8
STRING: Another evolutionary mechanism...

LABEL: 0x67E4
STRING: 「Is it really okay to interpret a simple coincidence like that as a mechanism?」

LABEL: 0x6833
STRING: 「What you have to understand is that evolution happens by "chance factors."」

LABEL: 0x6893
STRING: 「And that kind of evolution becomes more powerful when the group has a small population.」

LABEL: 0x690A
STRING: I couldn't grasp the meaning of what she was saying.

LABEL: 0x6932
STRING: Tokiwa continued.

LABEL: 0x69C2
STRING: 「Let's think of an extreme example.」

LABEL: 0x6A43
STRING: 「A meteorite has hit the Earth!」

LABEL: 0x6A76
STRING: 「Yes, all of humanity has been annihilated. The only two survivors have blond and chestnut hair.」

LABEL: 0x6ACA
STRING: 「Eventually, time passes, and they have a child.」

LABEL: 0x6B02
STRING: 「This child inherits the "blonde" allele from both parents.」

LABEL: 0x6B4C
STRING: 「And then...」

LABEL: 0x6B64
STRING: 「The parents' generation, where there were only two people in the gene pool,

LABEL: 0x6BC2
STRING: had both "blonde" and "chestnut" hair in their pool, but a generation later, there was only "blonde."」

LABEL: 0x6C24
STRING: 「See? The numbers fluctuated and then fixed to one allele in just one generation, right?」

LABEL: 0x6C87
STRING: 「But that's because there were only two of them――」

LABEL: 0x6D82
STRING: 「That's right! That's exactly it!」

LABEL: 0x6DB8
STRING: Tokiwa jumped up and down in excitement.

LABEL: 0x6DFB
STRING: 「Even if the genes are inherited by "chance," if the size of the group is small in the first place...」

LABEL: 0x6E53
STRING: 「...The frequency of alleles changes easily. And eventually, they become fixed!」

LABEL: 0x6EB5
STRING: 「In other words, if there are only a small number of individuals in a group, the diversity of their genes will be easily lost.」

LABEL: 0x6FCE
STRING: 「It's because of genetic diversity that living beings can survive, even if their environment changes.」

LABEL: 0x7040
STRING: Tokiwa hopped up and down again.

LABEL: 0x706E
STRING: The long lecture was finally reaching its climax.

LABEL: 0x70A9
STRING: 「Natural selection cannot occur without the alleles that make it possible in the first place.」

LABEL: 0x70FD
STRING: 「In order for the "long-necked giraffe" to survive,

LABEL: 0x7135
STRING: the gene that manifests the trait of a "long-neck" must exist within the group.」

LABEL: 0x718F
STRING: 「When population sizes are small, such genes can be lost through genetic drift.」

LABEL: 0x7250
STRING: 「This is the reason for protecting the "few."」

LABEL: 0x72A7
STRING: I see.

LABEL: 0x72BF
STRING: I was convinced.

LABEL: 0x72D7
STRING: It was a long and jargon-filled explanation, but the story made a lot of sense as a result.

LABEL: 0x7342
STRING: 「When populations are small, organisms lose genetic diversity――」

LABEL: 0x738A
STRING: 「――Their "available options" disappear.」

LABEL: 0x73CD
STRING: 「That's why there are attempts to breed animals

LABEL: 0x7413
STRING: from the Red Data Book.」

LABEL: 0x743F
STRING: She murmured to herself in approval as she explained.

LABEL: 0x74CA
STRING: ...And tilted her head to the side.

LABEL: 0x7505
STRING: 「Hmmm... Maybe you still don't understand?」

LABEL: 0x7544
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x7569
STRING: 「Breeding and such, of course, are important as well.」

LABEL: 0x759F
STRING: 「Once lost, genetic diversity cannot be regained.」

LABEL: 0x75E5
STRING: 「Let's say a million red lantern jellyfish were once on the verge of extinction, and their numbers were reduced to a hundred.」

LABEL: 0x7651
STRING: 「Suppose you breed them the best you can and get them back up to a million again.」

LABEL: 0x769C
STRING: 「Do you think the first million and the second million are the same?」

LABEL: 0x76E7
STRING: 「Well――」

LABEL: 0x7712
STRING: 「You're wrong.」

LABEL: 0x7733
STRING: Tokiwa denied me before I had time to answer.

LABEL: 0x77CD
STRING: 「The amount of alleles they have in their gene pool is decisively different.」

LABEL: 0x7825
STRING: 「Even if you increase the number of jellyfish from just a hundred to a million...」

LABEL: 0x7869
STRING: 「...We're just copying and amplifying the alleles that the original hundred had.」

LABEL: 0x78BE
STRING: 「That is the "bottleneck effect."」

LABEL: 0x78E8
STRING: 「Once the alleles that pass through the neck of the bottle make it inside,

LABEL: 0x792E
STRING: even if they spread afterward, in the end, there's still only the same amount as when they were narrowed down.」

LABEL: 0x7A1D
STRING: 「Again...」

LABEL: 0x7A3B
STRING: 「The possibilities that have been lost once can never be recovered.」

LABEL: 0x7A89
STRING: 「――Even if, at first glance, seemingly endless possibilities have been restored.」

LABEL: 0x7AD8
STRING: Lost possibilities couldn't be recovered.

LABEL: 0x7B02
STRING: Lost options, forgotten choices, would never come back.

LABEL: 0x7B4A
STRING: Trying to recover them would be pointless... and futile.

LABEL: 0x7B9E
STRING: In that case, all we could do was work hard to maintain the status quo――

LABEL: 0x7BF8
STRING: 「...Hey, weren't you a physics researcher?」

LABEL: 0x7C4B
STRING: 「That seems to be the case.」

LABEL: 0x7C7E
STRING: 「You sure know a lot about biology.」

LABEL: 0x7D10
STRING: 「At an elementary schoolers level, yes.」

LABEL: 0x7D3B
STRING: No, absolutely not.

LABEL: 0x7D59
STRING: I would like to meet an elementary schooler saying stuff like this.

LABEL: 0x7D89
STRING: My vocabulary in elementary school was...

LABEL: 0x7DB7
STRING: ...Let's stop. Just thinking about it made me sad.

LABEL: 0x7DFA
STRING: 「Physics, biology, and things like that are categorized by people.」

LABEL: 0x7E48
STRING: 「Nature is nature. From there on out, physics isn't something you can cut into pieces.」

LABEL: 0x7EA0
STRING: 「For example, the movement of celestial bodies can affect the behavior of microorganisms.」

LABEL: 0x7EF4
STRING: 「Of course, for convenience's sake, we can divide it into multiple fields and think of multiple approaches.」

LABEL: 0x7F4E
STRING: 「It's a meaningful thing to do, and I think it's useful in clarifying many things.」

LABEL: 0x7F98
STRING: 「But it's not good to misinterpret it as truth... That's all.」

LABEL: 0x8007
STRING: You could cut things up by human hands and think you controlled everything, but that wasn't the truth.

LABEL: 0x8063
STRING: Tokiwa grunted and stretched, and turned her eyes to the display again.

LABEL: 0x8142
STRING: 「――Now then, we've collected them safely.」

LABEL: 0x8170
STRING: 「Let's go retrieve them.」

LABEL: 0x819B
STRING: 「Wait, where did they go?」

LABEL: 0x8218
STRING: Tokiwa stood stock still after getting up from the pilot's seat.

LABEL: 0x8258
STRING: ...Seriously, was she thinking at all...?

LABEL: 0x8292
STRING: After showing me glimpses of her intelligence, this part of her seemed more endearing now as well, if I had to say...

LABEL: 0x82E6
STRING: ...Nope, she was still a pain in the ass.

LABEL: 0x83D8
STRING: 「Hnnnnnn――――――――」

LABEL: 0x841B
STRING: 「Please wait a moment.」

LABEL: 0x844A
STRING: 「H-Hey!」

LABEL: 0x8464
STRING: Tokiwa slowly stuck her hand into the chest area of her kimono.

LABEL: 0x84A0
STRING: ...Couldn't she feel a bit more, I don't know, reserved, or modest or something?

LABEL: 0x84F0
STRING: It was a scene that was hard to look at directly.

LABEL: 0x8510
STRING: Averting my eyes, I spotted Yukari sleeping peacefully like before.

LABEL: 0x8580
STRING: If she were to wake up now, what kind of slander would I be subjected to――

LABEL: 0x85D7
STRING: 「Oh, there it is.」

LABEL: 0x865E
STRING: 「The Anywhere Library!」

LABEL: 0x868B
STRING: Chanting in a husky voice, Tokiwa pulled out a familiar-looking PDA from her pocket.

LABEL: 0x86D6
STRING: Hey...! She pinched that from the library!

LABEL: 0x877A
STRING: 「They're in the laboratory, apparently.」

LABEL: 0x87A3
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x87C1
STRING: My key should open it.

LABEL: 0x87FF
STRING: I took the forged master key out of my pocket.

LABEL: 0x882F
STRING: It looked like a normal key, but it was functionally equivalent to a master key.

LABEL: 0x8885
STRING: At the moment, there shouldn't be any areas that couldn't be entered using it except the wheelhouse, but...

LABEL: 0x88D9
STRING: ...Somehow, I had a bad feeling about this.

LABEL: 0x897B
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, we need Yukari-san's master key to open the lab, so...」

LABEL: 0x89C9
STRING: 「Think of a good excuse for taking it without asking.」

LABEL: 0x8A18
STRING: 「Don't be absurd.」

LABEL: 0x8A36
STRING: Tokiwa didn't hesitate at all.

LABEL: 0x8A5A
STRING: It was almost refreshing how little guilt she felt about stealing.

LABEL: 0x8ABE
STRING: ...Or rather...

LABEL: 0x8ADA
STRING: 「Wait... Isn't that key...?」

LABEL: 0x8B68
STRING: 「Yes. It was in her breast pocket.」

LABEL: 0x8BA5
STRING: 「Sheesh...」

LABEL: 0x8BC9
STRING: Who would willingly grope around the chest of a sleeping girl?

LABEL: 0x8BFD
STRING: If you woke her up while doing that, she wouldn't just be angry...

LABEL: 0x8C5B
STRING: Well, Tokiwa was a girl, so I guess she understood the subtleties of the situation better than me.

LABEL: 0x8D0F
STRING: 「As long as we put my key there instead, it'll be fine.」

LABEL: 0x8D55
STRING: 「Nyan problem, right?」

LABEL: 0x8D7B
STRING: 「Non non, no problem, nyarlathotep!」

LABEL: 0x8DB6
STRING: She gave me an enigmatic thumbs-up after her one-woman show.

LABEL: 0x8DE4
STRING: She sure was getting rowdy.

LABEL: 0x8E0A
STRING: Certainly, we could solve the problem of entering the lab this way, but...

LABEL: 0x8E54
STRING: I had a bad feeling about it,

LABEL: 0x8E9E
STRING: thanks to Tokiwa being in such high spirits.

LABEL: 0x8EDA
STRING: She looked about ready to sprout wings and fly away by herself.

LABEL: 0x8F28
STRING: Was she this excited to see the deep-sea creatures in the flesh?

LABEL: 0x8F62
STRING: 「Hey, can we put my key in her pocket instead?」

LABEL: 0x8FBF
STRING: 「I don't myaind... Hmm, but why?」

LABEL: 0x9008
STRING: 「I don't want you to take the blame if something goes wrong.」

LABEL: 0x9044
STRING: 「You know, since I have a record already...」

LABEL: 0x9072
STRING: That wasn't a lie, but it wasn't how I really felt, either.

LABEL: 0x90B0
STRING: The truth was, I wanted to let Yukari have my forged master key.

LABEL: 0x9104
STRING: I didn't think that we were in a particularly dangerous situation right now, but if I had both of the master keys on me

LABEL: 0x916E
STRING: and was attacked or lost them... Well, there was always the possibility.

LABEL: 0x923C
STRING: 「Hmm... Aren't you kind, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x9272
STRING: 「I like kind people because they're kinder than people who aren't, you know?」

LABEL: 0x92B8
STRING: 「Well, if she gets mad, we'll cross that bridge when the time comes.」

LABEL: 0x92F4
STRING: 「Now, let's head to the lab so we don't wake her up!」

LABEL: 0x9339
STRING: I was rather impressed by her ability to spring to action.

LABEL: 0x9671
STRING: 「Ah! A jellyfish!」

LABEL: 0x9698
STRING: A water tank caught my eye as soon as we entered the laboratory.

LABEL: 0x96C8
STRING: Apparently, it was set up so that anything swallowed by the slurp gun would be sent here, one by one.

LABEL: 0x971E
STRING: As soon as we entered the room, Tokiwa raced to a jellyfish she had spotted, clinging to the water tank.

LABEL: 0x9778
STRING: ――Ten minutes passed.

LABEL: 0x97E1
STRING: 「Come on, let's go already!」

LABEL: 0x98CA
STRING: 「Just leave me behind!」

LABEL: 0x98FA
STRING: 「I told you, I can't!」

LABEL: 0x9A49
STRING: 「Ah, you're going to raise your hand against me! That's bad parenting! I'm suing you for domestic violence!」

LABEL: 0x9AA3
STRING: 「I'm not your dad! And how old are you anyway?!」

LABEL: 0x9B5B
STRING: 「You don't ask a woman her age, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x9B97
STRING: 「This is why you can't get a girlfriend, you know?」

LABEL: 0x9BDC
STRING: 「Shut up. That's none of your business!」

LABEL: 0x9C76
STRING: 「That narrow-mindedness of yours is only making it worse.」

LABEL: 0x9D05
STRING: 「I said I want to look, so why won't you let me?!」

LABEL: 0x9E09
STRING: 「I just want to watch the jellyfish!」

LABEL: 0x9E61
STRING: I was getting tired of this, to be honest.

LABEL: 0x9E83
STRING: There had also been the matter with Reiri yesterday.

LABEL: 0x9EA7
STRING: I didn't want to leave a girl alone in here, even if it was Tokiwa, but...

LABEL: 0x9F07
STRING: I surveyed the laboratory.

LABEL: 0x9F25
STRING: As one would expect, security was tight.

LABEL: 0x9FAE
STRING: 「I'll lock the door from the outside, okay?」

LABEL: 0x9FDC
STRING: 「You'll be able to open it from the inside... but don't open it if a stranger shows up, okay?」

LABEL: 0xA0A6
STRING: 「Okay, boss.」

LABEL: 0xA0E9
STRING: I was anxious... but we couldn't keep this up forever.

LABEL: 0xA12B
STRING: I left the laboratory, leaving Tokiwa behind.
